scripts.deploy_signs_upload: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_upload && gcloud functions deploy signs_upload --region europe-west1 --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs8
scripts.deploy_signs_submit: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_upload && gcloud functions deploy signs_submit --region europe-west1 --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs8
scripts.deploy_signs_approve: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_admin && gcloud functions deploy signs_approve --region europe-west1 --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs8
scripts.deploy_signs_admin: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_admin && gcloud functions deploy signs_admin --region europe-west1 --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs8
scripts.deploy_signs_process: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_admin && gcloud functions deploy signs_process --region europe-west1 --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs8
scripts.deploy_signs_process_image: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_process_image && gcloud functions deploy signs_process_image --region europe-west1 --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs8
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy_signs_upload && npm run deploy_signs_submit && npm run deploy_signs_approve && npm run deploy_signs_admin && npm run deploy_signs_process && npm run deploy_signs_process_image
scripts.test: cd signs_admin && npm test && cd ../signs_process_image && npm test
